p: The protein sequence of spike glycoprotein from Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV2) containing 193 amino acid residues from positions 331 to 524 is retrieved from GenBank database ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/protein/QHR63250.2) in FASTA format and considered as spike protein fragment in this study.
